lines.en: It spoke, it spoke of slavery, it spoke
It spoke, it spoke of opression, it spoke

lines.br: Falou, la nos tempos de Bimba, falou,
lines.en: It spoke, of the times of Bimba, it spoke
It spoke, today we heard

lines.br: Falou, la nos tempos de Bimba, falou,
lines.en: It spoke of the times of Bimba, it spoke
It spoke, today we heard

lines.br: O negro que sofria na senzala
lines.en: The black people that suffered in the senzala
Worked on the land of the owner

lines.br: E um dia ele escutou um lamento
lines.en: And one day he heard the call
It was Zumbi dos Palmares
It was him who freed them
Today they said
It spoke, it spoke of slavery, it spoke
It spoke, it spoke of opression, it spoke

lines.br: Falou, la nos tempos de Bimba, falou,
lines.en: It spoke of the times of Bimba, it spoke
It spoke, today we heard
The berimbau helped the capoeiristas

lines.br: La no tempo la no tempo da opressão
lines.en: There in the time, in the time of opression

lines.br: Se escutava o toque de cavalaria
lines.en: You hear the Cavalaria toque

lines.br: Quando a policia seguia berimbau já me avisou
lines.en: When the police arive, the berimbau already warned me
Today it said
It spoke, it spoke of slavery, it spoke
It spoke, it spoke of opression, it spoke

lines.br: Falou, la nos tempos de Bimba, falou,
lines.en: It spoke of the times of Bimba, it spoke
It spoke, today we heard
Manuel (Mestre Bimba) was a respected Mestre
Creator of the regional Art

lines.br: Hoje em dia seu nome será lembrado
lines.en: Today his name will be remembered

lines.br: Já não se esqueceu do homem que a capoeira falou...
lines.en: It hasn't forgotten the man that capoeira spoke about
It spoke, it spoke of slavery, it spoke
It spoke, it spoke of opression, it spoke

lines.br: Falou, la nos tempos de Bimba, falou,
lines.en: It spoke of the times of Bimba, it spoke
It spoke, today we heard

lines.br: Historia que se narran do passado
lines.en: History narrates the past

lines.br: Jogadores que se escutam até hoje
lines.en: Players that listen until today

lines.br: E os cantos que me levam pelos tempos
lines.en: And the songs that take me through the times

lines.br: Lembrando isso momentos onde o berimbau toco falou...
lines.en: Remembering the times where the berimbau spoke
It spoke, it spoke of slavery, it spoke
It spoke, it spoke of opression, it spoke

lines.br: Falou, la nos tempos de Bimba, falou,
lines.en: It spoke of the times of Bimba, it spoke
It spoke, today we heard

details.desc: Mestre Bimba was the creator of the Regional style of capoeira, thought to help decriminalise capoeira
The houses/buildings where the slaves lived on plantations
A famous warrior and king of the Quilombo dos Palmares
A berimbau rhythm that was played to warn capoeiraistas of the police arriving when capoeira was illegal
Manuel dos Reis Machado is the full name of Mestre Bimba - creator of the Regional style
